adHeader: MIROS HOUSECLEANING--- CHECK US OUT ON YELP!
adDetails: We have plenty of experience in the housecleaning area. Our services include: - Dust all surfaces and furnishings with a damp cloth including all baseboards - Clean all windows and window frames - Vacuum and/ or mop all floors and clean under all movable furniture - Scrub all fixtures and tile in the bathroom, a top-to-bottom cleaning - Degrease all kitchen counters, cabinets, and appliances (a clean-out of the insides of the refrigerator, oven etc) We will have your place looking good and clean, and make your life and home more enjoyable. We are trustworthy! Check us out on YELP (miros housecleaning) or call/text us at show contact info.
